member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Access_type
member.summary: The access type granted with this token. It can be offline or online.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Audience
member.summary: Who is the intended audience for this token. In general the same as issued_to.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Email
member.summary: The email address of the user. Present only if the email scope is present in the request.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Expires_in
member.summary: The expiry time of the token, as number of seconds left until expiry.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Issued_to
member.summary: To whom was the token issued to. In general the same as audience.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Scope
member.summary: The space separated list of scopes granted to this token.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.User_id
member.summary: The Gaia obfuscated user id.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Tokeninfo.Verified_email
member.summary: Boolean flag which is true if the email address is verified. Present only if the email scope is present in the request.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Birthday
member.summary: The user's birthday. The year is not present.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Email
member.summary: The user's email address.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Family_name
member.summary: The user's last name.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Gender
member.summary: The user's gender.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Given_name
member.summary: The user's first name.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Id
member.summary: The focus obfuscated gaia id of the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Link
member.summary: URL of the profile page.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Locale
member.summary: The user's default locale.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Name
member.summary: The user's full name.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Picture
member.summary: URL of the user's picture image.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Timezone
member.summary: The user's default timezone.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Data.Userinfo.Verified_email
member.summary: Boolean flag which is true if the email address is verified.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Oauth2Service.Key
member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Oauth2Service.Scopes
member.summary: A list of all OAuth2.0 scopes. Each of these scopes relates to a permission or group of permissions that different methods of this API may need.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Oauth2Service.Scopes.UserinfoEmail
member.summary: View your email address

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Oauth2Service.Scopes.UserinfoProfile
member.summary: View basic information about your account

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Oauth2Service.TokeninfoRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Oauth2.v2.Oauth2Service.TokeninfoRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.
